I'm interested in developing software that is scalable, performant and intuitive. After taking time away from my engineering career to focus on my family, I am looking forward to returning to life as a developer.

My interests include C/C++, Javascript, React, HTML/CSS, and MongoDB. I'm also familiar with Java and Python.

View My Work

Education

I have a Bachelor's and Master's Degree in Computer Engineering. I also develop personal projects and take courses on Udemy to learn new technologies.

Experience

I worked as a Software Engineer for 9 years designing, developing and testing software to control multi-threaded embedded systems.

Additional Responsibilities

My responsibilities also included writing software requirements, design documents, presenting the architecture details to customers, and writing unit and end-to-end tests.

Communication

I've written training manuals and given product demos. I also ran final acceptance tests with customers and brought new team members up to speed on projects.
